function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to population density and compact design in built environments.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreaks if not mitigated.","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to promote hygiene, ventilation, and social distancing in densely populated areas.","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems, touchless technology, and building automation systems for contactless interactions.","People":"Residents, workers, and visitors in densely populated cities and urban areas.","Owner":"City planners, architects, building developers, and public health officials."},{"Description":"Rapid spread of contagious diseases due to sudden policy changes impacting built environment development.","Impact":"Unpredictable and sudden shifts in disease transmission dynamics due to abrupt policy updates.","Mitigation":"Stakeholder collaboration and communication to ensure smooth implementation of policy changes with minimal disruption to public health.","Technologies":"Digital communication tools, collaborative platforms, and real-time data analytics to monitor and respond to policy changes.","People":"Policy makers, urban planners, public health officials, and community leaders.","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations, and community development stakeholders."},{"Description":"Gradual development of new practices and perspectives leading to changes in built environment design and construction.","Impact":"Opportunity to integrate public health considerations into long-term urban planning and infrastructure development.","Mitigation":"Education and awareness campaigns to promote the adoption of public health principles in built environment design and construction.","Technologies":"Building information modeling (BIM), geospatial analysis, and data-driven urban planning tools for evidence-based decision-making.","People":"Urban planners, architects, developers, and construction industry professionals.","Owner":"Industry associations, educational institutions, and research organizations."}]}
